/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades adorned with colorful signs and advertisements that add a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. Cars and bicycles are parked along the street, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
